name: The Perspective Love
description:
The Perspective Love.

This is my entry for the Hyper Casual Game Jam #2 on the theme "Perspective Matters".

Controls : W/A/S/D or Z/Q/S/D or Arrow Keys or GamePad

Every 4 seconds the camera changes and you either loose perspective or get it back on. You need to adapt fast and you will soon realize that perspective it your best friend.

Your goal is to control the player (Blue Cube) and avoid colliding with basically everything.

The level is infinite and randomly generated so try to beat your highscores. I'm curious to see how far you can go.

F2 : Take Screenshot 

F11 : Toggle FullScreen Mode

Escape : Quit Game

Thanks for playing!
